name: Seraphin Partners
overview:
Seraphin Partners works exclusively with high-tech, early and growth-stage businesses. We specialize in helping our clients with the business strategy and finance aspects of company development.

Services we offer include operational and strategic advisory, equity and option valuations (including option valuation to comply with IRS Code 409a valuations), venture capital raise consulting, and M&A advisory.

Whether you need to scale your sales team, test the market for a round of financing, examine potential exit strategies, or value your option pool, we are bent on making you as successful as possible.
